title: Thousand Separator - String - Easy - LeetCode
content:
Given an integer n, add a dot (".") as the thousands separator and return it in string format.   Example 1: Input: n = 987
Output: "987"
Example 2: Input: n = 1234

content:

title: Prime Arrangements - Math - Easy - LeetCode
content:

content:
